# OpenApiDocDescriptor.ToNode method

Converts a .NET object to a JsonNode representation.

```csharp
public static JsonNode? ToNode(object? value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The .NET object to convert. |

## Return Value

A JsonNode representing the object, or null if the object is null.
